Package walker.easydb.dao

Class Summary
BaseEntity 抽象实体类， 所有实体类的基类， 其子类与数据库的元数据形成映射。
EasyDao EasyDB的功能接口
EntityParser This class parses the BaseEntity object to following parts: the class name of the given BaseEntity object, the fileds and methods of the BaseEntity object.
FieldExp This class express the field of BaseEntity object.
PageList 支持分页查询的ArrayList
ResultAssembler This class builds the BaseEntity object.
SettingMethodExp This class express the setting Method of BaseEntity object.
SqlConstructor This class constructs the INSERT/DELETE/QUERY/UPDATE sql, it supports for multiple database.
SqlParamIndexer  
SqlParamMap 本类为参数化SQL装载参数值。
